item.title: [Delta]Can soneone help me finish this?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:523027”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=641524.msg4321780#msg4321780 date=1372300292]
how would i remove the object for certain amount of time then have it come back by also removing another object? you have the idea process but no help…i know thats what im suppose to be doing but don’t know how to put it…thats why i posted this
[/quote]
No, you posted “Can someone help me finish this” and then said:
“thanks if you can finish it”
That’s asking us to make it for you.

Use timers. Replace the object with the empty one, and start the timer. when the timer hits X, it spawns the full stall then stops the timer[/quote]

:o I give up on these the forums…nobody helps anymore…you didn’t do anything but tell me the process…i know what to do, but at the same time I don’t know how to do that…thats why i posted this question

I need code not words plz

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Can soneone help me finish this?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

MrFun:

how would i remove the object for certain amount of time then have it come back by also removing another object? you have the idea process but no help…i know thats what im suppose to be doing but don’t know how to put it…thats why i posted this

No, you posted “Can someone help me finish this” and then said:
“thanks if you can finish it”
That’s asking us to make it for you.

Use timers. Replace the object with the empty one, and start the timer. when the timer hits X, it spawns the full stall then stops the timer

item.title: [Delta]Can soneone help me finish this?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Here is my thieving code on stalls

if(objectID == 2561 && playerLevel[17] >= 0){ //bakery stall if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; actionInterval = 2000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); sM("You steal some coins."); addSkillXP(180, 17); addItem(995, 500); setAnimation(0x340); } if(objectID == 2563){ //fur stall if(playerLevel[17] >= 20){ if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; actionInterval = 2000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); sM("You steal some coins."); addSkillXP(500, 17); addItem(995, 2500); setAnimation(0x340); } else sM("You need 20 Thieving to steel this stall!"); } if(objectID == 2560){ //silk stall if(playerLevel[17] >= 45){ if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; actionInterval = 2000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); sM("You steal some coins."); addSkillXP(1560, 17); addItem(995, 5000); setAnimation(0x340); } else sM("You need 45 Thieving to steel this stall!"); } if(objectID == 2565){ //silver stall if(playerLevel[17] >= 70){ if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; actionInterval = 2000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); sM("You steal some coins."); addSkillXP(5240, 17); addItem(995, 21000); setAnimation(0x340); } else sM("You need 70 Thieving to steel this stall!"); } if(objectID == 2562){ //gem stall if(playerLevel[17] >= 90){ if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; actionInterval = 2000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); sM("You steal some coins."); addSkillXP(25600, 17); addItem(995, 26000); setAnimation(0x340); } else sM("You need 90 Thieving to steel this stall!"); }

I want to make where the stall disappears and responds back after a certain time
thanks if you can finish it(need code)

Read full topic
